name: Summoned (New Beings)
description:
Summoned is an exploratory, platformer in a very small space. Mostly it's about jumping around and being a cute demon.

The game's story, which didn't quite make it in is that a little girl summons you to help her. With what? Oh destroy her evil imaginary haunts and kick back and eat berries together. That's the source right there.

It was my (Jake's) first LD and I had a blast. I plan to continue developing it because I'm happy with the idea and I like the world. So please enjoy it too!

Ludum Dare page
